pct:challenge.pct:name: Full Clear: The Fetid Pool
pct:challenge.pct:description: Fully clear the Fetid Pool.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Identify a Unique Item
pct:challenge.pct:description: Identify any Unique Item. You can trade it away afterwards.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kole the Cruel
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill Kole in Cruel difficulty or higher.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Room to Grow
pct:challenge.pct:description: Create a medium-sized Hideout.

pct:challenge.pct:name: The Golden Hand
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete the quest "Through Sacred Ground" in Merciless difficulty.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Full Clear: Vaal Fragment
pct:challenge.pct:description: Fully clear a Vaal Side Area that was created using a Map Device.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kill a Unique Map Boss
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill the boss of a Unique Map.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Reach level 85
pct:challenge.pct:description: Reach level 85.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Defender
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill any Invasion Boss.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Exorcist
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill a Unique monster that has been possessed by a Tormented spirit.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Bait
pct:challenge.pct:description: Open an unidentified Rare Strongbox.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Unstoppable
pct:challenge.pct:description: Reach the fifth Rampage tier.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Finder of the Trove
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill a pack of Magic monsters with the Keepers of the Trove Bloodline mod.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Assassination
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill any Warband Leader.

pct:challenge.pct:name: A Worthy Foe
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill the Boss of a Tier 8 or higher Map while it has Onslaught.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Seal the Portal
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill a Unique Beyond boss.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Weather the Storm
pct:challenge.pct:description: Fully clear a Rare map that is affected by both a Tempest prefix and suffix.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Treasure Hunter
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill a Rare monster with the Inner Treasure Nemesis mod.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Fall of the Phoenix
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill Igna Phoenix.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Reach Out and Touch Faith
pct:challenge.pct:description: Touch a Divine Shrine.
